allow: Bash(powershell -Command "$env:STRATEGY_NAME=''''; $env:SCALPING_STOP_LOSS_PCT=''''; $env:SCALPING_TAKE_PROFIT_PCT=''''; python -c ''from config import Config; c = Config(); print(f""initial_capital: {c.initial_capital}""); print(f""overall_drawdown_limit: {c.overall_drawdown_limit}""); print(f""Floor: {c.initial_capital * (1.0 - c.overall_drawdown_limit)}"")''")
